rows.title: PHP mail function doesn't complete sending of e-mail

23:
<p>If you only use the <code>mail()</code>function, you need to complete the configuration file.</p>

<p>You need to open the mail expansion, and set the <code>SMTP  smtp_port</code> and so on, and most important, your username and your password. Without that, mail cannot be sent. Also, you can use the <code>PHPMail</code> class to send. </p>
